meanings.definition: Stithying (verb): the act of stitching or sewing
meanings.sent1: I enjoy the stithying of colorful patches onto my backpack.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother's stithying skills are unmatched.
meanings.sent3: The stithying of the torn teddy bear brought it back to life.
meanings.sent4: Her stithying of words into beautiful poetry is truly an art.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic stithying of the sewing machine was soothing.

meanings.definition: Stithying (noun): a stitch or seam in fabric
meanings.sent1: The delicate stithying on the dress added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent2: I need to fix the loose stithying on my shirt.
meanings.sent3: The stithying on the hem came undone during the dance.
meanings.sent4: The stithying on the quilt held memories together.
meanings.sent5: Her precise stithying created a seamless finish on the curtains.
